document.full_text: mali's president, amadou toumani toure, has appointed cisse mariam kaidama as prime minister to replace modibo sidibe, who resigned last week, an official statement said.
document.title: mali's president names country's first woman pm
lines_and_colors: mali's president, amadou toumani toure, has appointed cisse mariam kaidama as prime minister to replace modibo sidibe, who resigned last week, an official statement said.
